entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
